= Installing =

 # Install EclipseIde
 # Update to Install GEF in Eclipse
 # Download the AIR GEAR jar, from [http://iij.dl.sourceforge.jp/amateras/38801/net.sf.amateras.air_1.0.2.jar here]. v1.02 - 2009-04-15
 # Place it into you dropins directory
 # Restart Eclipse
